allow: Bash(python -c "import sqlite3; conn = sqlite3.connect\(''db/db.sqlite3''\); cursor = conn.cursor\(\); cursor.execute\(''SELECT id, username, email, is_superuser, is_staff, is_active FROM finances_customuser WHERE is_superuser = 1 OR is_staff = 1''\); results = cursor.fetchall\(\); print\(''Superusers/Staff:''\); [print\(f''  ID: {r[0]}, Username: {r[1]}, Email: {r[2]}, Superuser: {r[3]}, Staff: {r[4]}, Active: {r[5]}''\) for r in results]; cursor.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM finances_customuser''\); total = cursor.fetchone\(\)[0]; print\(f''\\nTotal users: {total}''\); conn.close\(\)")
